section.title: Disable Instant Messenger Client (gaim)
section.para: Disables the Gaim and Pidgin instant messenger client. If the Gaim or Pidgin package is installed, this module will remove all permissions from /usr/bin/gaim and /usr/bin/pidgin. On Solaris systems, this module will look in /usr/local/bin.
If an instant messenger is needed, configure your network to restrict with whom end-users can communicate. If this client is not needed, remove the package.
